vse2017training:
Please use this link if you are following the demo scripts for the Mobile DevOps demo created for the Visual Studio Enterprise 2017 World Wide Sales Training. We recommend that you use the devops-mobile.visualstudio.com account as the account is pre-configured with agents necessary for building iOS and Android applications. Please see the link provided above on how you can create a Personal Access Token (PAT).

If you are not following the VSE 2017 training or want to try other templates, please use this link
